usefulItems: spring form tin (Ø 26 cm), baking paper, skewer, oven
title: Pear and Walnut Cake

ingredients.content: 100 g olive oil, plus extra for greasing
350 g plain flour, plus extra for dusting
320 g pears, peeled, cored, cut in pieces

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 200°C. Line base and grease and flour sides of a spring form cake tin (Ø 25 cm).
Place walnuts in mixing bowl and chop <b>4 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to a bowl.
Place pears in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to bowl with chopped walnuts.
Place oil, sugar, flour, evaporated milk, baking powder, cinnamon, vanilla and eggs in mixing bowl then mix <b>30 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add reserved chopped pears and walnuts then mix <b>30 sec//speed 3<b>. Transfer to prepared tin and bake for 45-55 minutes (200°C) until skewer inserted in centre comes out clean.
Allow cake to stand in tin for 10 minutes. Remove from tin and turn cake upside down for 10 minutes. Place correct side up and allow to cool before dusting with icing sugar and serving.
